narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative and Joe Kovach, Animal Care Inspector.
Applicant wishes to be licensed as a class "A" breeder.
License fee and a copy of this inspection report must be mailed to: 
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
920 Main Campus D. Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27606
Standards and recordkeeping requirements have been explained.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
